document.full_text: christine o'donnell, the defeated republican candidate for the senate in delaware in 2010 and a tea party favorite, has filed amended campaign reporting forms to fix mistakes, her lawyer said on friday.
document.title: o'donnell files amended delaware senate campaign report
lines_and_colors: christine o'donnell, the defeated republican candidate for the senate in delaware in 2010 and a tea party favorite, has filed amended campaign reporting forms to fix mistakes, her lawyer said on friday.
